title: FARM ANIMALS PACK
description: This pack gathers 5 farm animals that are ready to be dropped into your project. Perfect to enhance any environment with a farm, barn, coop, fields etc.
longDescription:
This pack gathers 5 farm animals that are ready to be dropped into your project. Perfect to enhance any environment with a farm, barn, coop, fields etc.


Chicken: 3.8 Ktris // 41 bones // 2048² textures // 3 skins // 11 animations

https://sketchfab.com/models/708160367d3c464ba7dfbbb6768ce434


Cow: 10.64 Ktris // 40 bones // 4096² textures // 3 skins // 14 animations

https://sketchfab.com/models/00ecb41dcb9f42f097eddb61b9adfce3


Goat: 10.1 Ktris // 35 bones // 4096² textures // 15 animations

https://sketchfab.com/models/b7ee7bdc525c4eccb5ef4319002edb18


Pig: 11 Ktris // 35 bones // 4096² textures // 2 Skins // 13 animations

https://sketchfab.com/models/38dcae26e4004722a46598f84653a586


Sheep: 9 Ktris // 31 bones // 2048² textures // 11 animations

https://sketchfab.com/models/a348250800f94e4eb5dbaff0a60e3b56


Intended for PC / MAC and latest Gen consoles
technicalDetails:
Scaled to Epic skeleton: Yes

Rigged: Yes

Rigged to Epic skeleton: No

Animated: Yes

Number of characters: 5

Vertex counts of characters: Chicken: 2.5 K // Cow: 5.5 K // Goat: 5.2 K // Pig: 5.7 K // Sheep: 4.59 K

Texture Resolutions: Chicken: 2048² // Cow: 4096² // Goat: 4096² // Pig: 4096² // Sheep: 4096²

Number of Animations: Chicken: 11 // Cow: 14 // Goat: 15 // Pig: 13 // Sheep: 12

Animation types (Root Motion/In-place): Chicken: Root Motion (3) and In Place (8) // Cow: Root Motion (3) and In Place (11) // Goat: Root Motion (3) and In Place (12) // Pig: Root Motion (3) and In Place (10) // Sheep: Root Motion (3) and In Place (9)

Engine Compatibility: UNREAL ENGINE // 4.15 And Up

Intended Platform: Desktop PC / MAC / XBox1 / PS4

Platforms Tested: PC

Documentation Included: No

Important\Additional Notes: None

releaseInfo.releaseNote: 10/18/2018: Pig , cow, goat and sheep updated (turning, resting and new attacks)
